original: sems can dbang du byas nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la 'jug pa rnams la dbang du bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sems can dbang du byas nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la 'jug pa rnams la dbang du bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ba'o //

analyzed: de ni sngon bshad pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das ma yongs su rdzogs par bya ba las /

analyzed: gzhan yangs bon dang phyag mtshan dmar po yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog dmar mor rnam par bsgoms shing legs par mchod de /
translated: from the transformation of the other seed syllable and hand implement into a red color, visualize the red-colored body, and make excellent offerings.

original: de kho na nyid gsum las nges par grub pa'i thod pa kha sbub pa gsum gyi steng du yi ge a'a dmar po las byung ba'i padma'i snod kyi steng du dam tshig bcu dang / dbyangs bcu drug dang / ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhis kyang byin gyis brlabs par bltas pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum las nges par grub pa'i thod pa kha sbub pa gsum gyi steng du yi ge a'a dmar po las byung ba'i padma'i snod kyi steng du dam tshig bcu dang / dbyangs bcu drug dang / ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhis kyang byin gyis brlabs par bltas pa'o //
translated: From the three definitive accomplishments of reality, three inverted skull-cups, upon which are three red letters A, which become lotus vessels, one should visualize the ten commitments, the sixteen vowels, and the thirty-four consonants, which also bless the skull-cup.

original: 'og tu yam dang ram yongs su gyur pa las rlung dang / me'i dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis bar zhing bskol te /
analyzed: 'og tu yam dang ram yongs su gyur pa las rlung dang / me'i dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis bar zhing bskol te /

original: dam tshig rnams dang sa bon de dag gi 'od zer gyis kyang bskul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs spyan drangs la de'i nang du bstim mo //
analyzed: dam tshig rnams dang sa bon de dag gi 'od zer gyis kyang bskul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs spyan drangs la de'i nang du bstim mo //
translated: The light rays of the commitments and the seeds summon the hosts of Tathagatas, who dissolve into them.

original: dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um las byung zhing /
analyzed: dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um las byung zhing /

original: des byin gyis brlabs shing zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa 'od zer gyi dra ba 'phro ba dang ldan pa'o //

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa yang zla ba dang rdo rje la legs par bzhugs @39b par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa yang zla ba dang rdo rje la legs par bzhugs @39b par bya ba'o //

original: ma smin pa dang yid gnyis la sogs pa'i skyon dag par byed pa de'i steng du yi ge aom bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: ma smin pa dang yid gnyis la sogs pa'i skyon dag par byed pa de'i steng du yi ge aom bsgom par bya ste /

original: de'i 'od spros pas bdud rtsi'i sku mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi yang de la gzhug par bya ba'o //
